values.title: John Green
values.desc: The marks humans leave are too often scars

values.title: JK Rowling
values.desc: Numbing the pain for a while will make it worse when you finally feel it

values.title: William Goldman
values.desc: Life is pain highness Anyone who says differently is selling something

values.title: Laurell K Hamilton
values.desc: There are wounds that never show on the body that are deeper and more hurtful than anything that bleeds

values.title: George RR Martin
values.desc: Some old wounds never truly heal and bleed again at the slightest word

values.title: Ernest Hemingway
values.desc: The most painful thing is losing yourself in the process of loving someone too much and forgetting that you are special too

values.title: Lance Armstrong Sally Jenkins
values.desc: Pain is temporary. Quitting lasts forever

values.title: Markus Zusak
values.desc: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face Then think of doing it twentyfour hours a day

values.title: Jos N Harris
values.desc: Tears she'd for another person are not a sign of weakness, They are a sign of a pure heart

values.title: John Lennon
values.desc: One thing you can't hide - is when youre crippled inside

values.title: Roy T Bennett
values.desc: Time doesnt heal emotional pain. you need to learn how to let go

values.title: Bob Dylan
values.desc: Behind every beautiful thing, theres some kind of pain

values.title: JK Rowling
values.desc: You care so much you feel as though you will bleed to death with the pain of it
